Articles.Content:
Inspired by my failed landing on the mun in career mode about 1 minute ago as of typing this.

"Jeb! Jeb! Ten meters! You're angled incorrectly!" The Capcom, Bill said.

"I'll get this!" Jeb shouted. "Oh shi-" Static.

"Jeb? Jeb?" Bill said.

"I think we've lost Jeb." Gene said gravely.

"Yeah, no vitals."

"No signal."

"There goes are most valued astronaut." Gene said.

JEBEDIAH KERMAN

FIRST KERBAL IN SPACE

FIRST DEAD IN SPACE EXPLORATION

Year 1, Day 1 - Year 1, Day 352, 13 hours, 17 minutes.

R.I.P. Jeb... a sad day!

When I lost Philton I vowed never to lose another Kerbal again! and hence I use quicksave/revert a lot!
[revert to launch pad 2 days, 32 minutes ago]

[revert to launch pad 2 days, 32 minutes ago]

I didn't revert because I wanted to be fair.

Fun Fact : Jeb was first kerbal in space using a rocket that is designed to be an LLRV-type thing.
